title: Are the Sial tribe Jat people? - Quora

response.answer_text: In current scenario, castes are irrelevant. Again, genetically, there is not much of a difference, so casteism must not be encouraged. Still, since you asked, here is the response:- Sials, also known as Syal or Sayal, are found among Jats, Rajputs and Khatris. They are found in Rajasthan, Delhi, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Panjab. Even among Jats, Sial/Syal caste has high reputation. They founded and ruled Jhang for 7 or 8 centuries. They are bonafide residents of Panjab, Himachal, Rajasthan, MP and Haryana. They use titles like Chaudhary and Singh. There are few cities that are named in Rajasthan and British Panjab after their name. They enjoy simple living and were classified as agricultural tribe (synonymous to martial race) by Britishers.

Yes. 1st ruler who established Sialkot father Great King Salvan Jat,father of Raja Rasalu and Puran of Sial/Syal Jat Clan.Even today also Sialkot is “garh” of Royal Sial Jats. Raja Rasalu ruled over whole of current Pakistan, till Makran Coast in Iran and his territories extended till Delhi boundaries in East and Uttar Kuru up North. In a very near, later times another Jat capital of Taxila was founded by King Moga Jat in close proximity of Sialkot. Recorded and various great sites and bridges on Chenab/Indus in Pakistan are under this great legendary King Rasalu of Sial Jat Clan. Raja Rasalu and Bhagat Puran were brothers. Puran Bhagat is very famous folklore and his “Bhagat Kuan or Ku” is still and cure of illness. Great Place to see, both Sialkot Fort and Bhagat Puran place. Its around 100 BC old fort.

Shiyal, Syal, Shyal or Shial Is A Clan Of Kshatriya Koli Community Of The Gujarat. They Drived Their Name From Shiyal Island. Shiyal Kolis Were Noted Pirates. Shiyal Was Their Stronghold. On The Arrival Of Portuguese In India Shial Kolis Was Strongest Enemy Of Portuguese. For Example, In 1531, Portuguese Naval Fleet Warships Under Command Of General And Governor Nuno Da Cunha Ordered To Capture The Diu Port Of Gujarat Sultanate But Shial Koli Pirates Of Shiyal Bet Island Fought Valiantly And Bravely Against Portugese And Defeated The Portugese Naval Fleets. Shiyal Bet Was Stronghold Of Koli Pirates. But The Nawab Of Janjira State Marched Against Shial Kolis And Defeated Them.
